DataElement.preferredName: Specimen Hypodiploidy Cytogenetic Abnormality Present Checkbox Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator determining determining whether or not there is presence of the cytogenetic abnormality, hypodiploidy (a chromosomal abnormality in which the chromosomal number is less than the normal diploid number).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to the presence of the cytogenetic abnormality, hypodiploidy (a chromosomal abnormality in which the chromosomal number is less than the normal diploid number).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Specimen; a bit of tissue or blood or urine that is taken or used for research purposes.

Concepts.definition: A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: A chromosomal abnormality in which the chromosomal number is less than the normal diploid number.:An irregularity in the number or structure of chromosomes, usually in the form of a gain (duplication), loss (deletion), exchange (translocation), or alteration in sequence (inversion) of genetic material.:Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

Concepts.definition: A chromosomal abnormality in which the chromosomal number is less than the normal diploid number.

An irregularity in the number or structure of chromosomes, usually in the form of a gain (duplication), loss (deletion), exchange (translocation), or alteration in sequence (inversion) of genetic material.
Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Changed from CTEP to Alliance for by script Fri Oct 25 15:25:44 EDT 2013

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator determining determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist._An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
